entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
